[h1] My thoughts on Portal (aka P()RTAL) [/h1]
Portal is a 3d platforming game where you are a guy with a Portal gun, she wakes up in a bed and start doing tests for GLaDOS. After that, GLaDOS tries to betray me by sending me to a fire pit, using the portal logics, I've escaped the fire. Then I will infiltrate, find and destroy GLaDOS at the end of the game.
[h1] Why it Rocks (my opinion) [/h1]
[olist]
[*] Nice Graphics (Half-Life 2 and Portal uses the same engine, source engine)
[*] GLaDOS has an autotuned voice
[*] those [strike] cute [/strike] evil turrets, I thought they are nice, but they tried to kill me!
[*] I wish I had a portal gun in real life because I don't have to walk anymore.
[/olist]
[h1] Bad Qualities (my opinion) [/h1]
[olist]
[*] The story is too short.
[*] The turrets can get annoying sometimes. (i dont think they are cute tho)
[/olist]
[h1] Trivia [/h1]
[list]
[*] I always wished for this game when I was a kid, but now I got it so I am very happy.
[*] I played the sequel (Portal 2) before this game.
[/list]
[h1] Overview [/h1]
Score : 7 (Good)

It's Portal. It's a weird puzzle-FPS hybrid that works wonders. If you like puzzles, you're gonna love it. If you like shooting, you're gonna love it. If you like well written bad guys, boy are you in for a treat here.
It's a little on the short side, but advanced chambers and challenge maps can keep you playing long after you beat the game. Beware of malicious level geometry, I spent quite a while on a chamber only to fling myself, bump into a piece of chamber-dressing and find myself back where I started.
If you think you're gonna like it, it's worth every cent. In fact, if you think you'll like it, grab the Portal + Portal 2 bundle, it's a classic, you can't really go wrong here.

great game

este a sido el mejor juego que eh jugado de el 2020, tiene un muy buen Lore y como no tenerlo si fue desarrollado por VALVE el mismo desarrollador que hizo la saga de Half Life, Este juego es demasiado bueno tanto como ya dije en Lore como en otros aspectos, La jugabilidad es sencilla tiene una temática que en su tiempo de salida en el 2007 fue muy innovadora, este juego prácticamente no tiene HUD eso hace que te sientas mas dentro de el juego.
Hablando de Gráficos.
Este juego tiene buenos gráficos claro no comparados a los de un juego mas actual como Cyberpunk, Pero si que tiene unos gráficos bastante buenos ya que esta hecho en el motor gráfico SOURCE ya que VALVE reutiliza sus motores gráficos para todos sus juegos, pero eso no hace que sea un mal juego o que tenga poco merito de realización.
---------------
En mi opinión este es un juego que tiene que estar en tu biblioteca de juegos, pero eso si deberías comprar también su secuela Portal 2 para continuar con la aventura al acabar Portal

a este juego le doy 10/10

Hello, this is an excellent game. It is one of the best games I've ever played. It still holds up really well 14 years later and I would recommend to anyone who wants a game that will make them think a lot. This game is definitely not educational but it will take a lot of thinking to beat. I have beat it 4 times and I got it yesterday. Portal has a lot of replay value. This is a masterpiece and you should buy it.
Some brief difficulty spikes, but regardless this deserves to be known as a classic. really great experience.
